statements: UPDATE Green_Transportation_Impact SET air_quality_index = 75 WHERE city = 'New York';
UPDATE Green_Transportation_Impact SET public_health_outcomes = 'Improved respiratory health' WHERE initiative_name = 'Eco-Friendly Bus System' AND country = 'USA';
UPDATE Green_Transportation_Impact SET air_quality_index = 50, public_health_outcomes = 'Improved' WHERE city = 'New York' AND country = 'USA' AND start_date = '2022-01-01';
UPDATE Green_Transportation_Impact SET initiative_name = 'EcoCity Project', end_date = '2023-12-31', air_quality_index = 65 WHERE city = 'Los Angeles' AND country = 'USA';
UPDATE impact_of_initiatives SET impact_score = 8 WHERE initiative_name = 'Renewable Energy Initiative'
UPDATE public_health_outcomes SET outcome_value = 2.5, city = 'New York' WHERE outcome_type = 'Asthma Cases'
UPDATE impact_of_initiatives SET impact_score = 50 WHERE initiative_name = 'Green Energy Initiative';
UPDATE public_health_outcomes SET outcome_value = 8.9 WHERE city = 'New York' AND outcome_type = 'Air Quality';
UPDATE Green_Transportation_Initiatives SET initiative_name = 'Electric Buses Project' WHERE initiative_id = 1;
UPDATE Air_Quality_Data SET level = 3.5 WHERE data_id = 5;

UPDATE Green_Transportation_Initiatives SET initiative_name = 'Eco-Friendly Commuting', initiative_description = 'Promoting non-motorized transportation', start_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE initiative_id = 1;
UPDATE Air_Quality_Data SET level = 2.5, measurement_date = '2022-03-15' WHERE data_id = 5;
UPDATE GreenInitiativesImpact SET start_date = '2022-05-15', end_date = '2022-11-30' WHERE initiative_id = 1;
UPDATE AirQualityData SET location = 'Urban Center', pollutant_level = 3.5 WHERE data_id = 10;
UPDATE GreenInitiativesImpact SET impact_description = 'Reduced carbon emissions by 20%' WHERE initiative_id = 1;
UPDATE InitiativesHealthImpact SET impact_details = 'Improved respiratory health in local community' WHERE initiative_id = 2;
UPDATE GreenInitiatives SET start_date = '2022-01-01', end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE initiative_id = 1;
UPDATE HealthOutcomes SET affected_population = 500, disease_type = 'Asthma' WHERE location_id = 3 AND date = '2022-06-15';
UPDATE GreenInitiatives SET start_date = '2022-01-01', end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE initiative_id = 1001;
UPDATE InitiativesImpact SET impact_factor = 0.75, impact_description = 'Significant positive impact on air quality' WHERE initiative_id = 1002 AND location_id = 2001;
